channel.title: Chaostreff Osnabrück e.V. - RSS Feed
channel.description: News and Updates from the Chaostreff Osnabrück e.V.

item.title: We're moving!
item.content:encoded:
The Chaostreff Osnabrück e.V. is moving to a new dedicated location! From now on all meetings will take place in the AStA of the University of Osnabrück, Alte Münze 12, 49074 Osnabrück.

We have named out new hackspace Rabbithole and we look forward to setting up our new home.
item.author: Chaostreff Osnabrück

item.title: Open Letter Covid Contact Tracing Apps
item.content:encoded: We wrote an open letter regarding covid contact tracing apps. You can find the full text in our German news post.
item.author: Chaostreff Osnabrück

item.title: Statement about the Freedom of Information Act
item.content:encoded: We wrote an open letter regarding the Freedom of Information Act. You can find the full text in our German news post.
item.author: Chaostreff Osnabrück

item.title: The social network osna.social is going live
item.content:encoded: We're launching the mastodon server osna.social. Read more about it in our German announcement.
item.author: Chaostreff Osnabrück

item.title: Founding of Chaostreff Osnabrück e.V.
item.content:encoded: Since 2013, a round of hackers meets monthly in Osnabrück. This develops into the founding of the club Chaostreff Osnabrück e.V.
item.author: Chaostreff Osnabrück
